price: 106. Hubaal, arrinkani waxaa ugu sugan Gaarsiin cad qolo na caabudda.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي هَٰذَا لَبَلَٰغٗا لِّقَوۡمٍ عَٰبِدِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna fī hādhā labalāghan liqawmin ʿābidīna
